messages.message:
Hi
We have been reviewing our Access logs and listing out the GAPs.
At a high level the GAPs are analysed on 3 categories:
• missing events
• missigns fields in existing audit logs
• data quality issues.
• Auditlog storage and alert rules
• Incident management - tools and processes.
The Analysis doc can be found here - Auditlog Gap analysis (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1oIjAdkOHkWLcKwJjxhb_Vd8epawFD4ttZIsmLhpk1rw/edit?tab=t.0)
Will be working with broader EPD to remedy GAPs in the coming weeks.
